channel.title: Needing a client for other users
channel.description:
I recently downloaded the Syscape Client with the server files, I have my own no-ip host, how can I get a 317 client which allows users to change the ip, and will allow them to log into my server.
I have tried it on Moparscape v3.2 but that doesn't work, any other clients that are for 317, which allow other users to change the ip and to log into my server.
